text: Jean-Jacques Sempé, usually known as Sempé (; 17 August 1932 – 11 August 2022), was a French cartoonist. He was known for his work on the children's book Le Petit Nicolas. Sempé died on 11 August 2022 at his secondary home in Draguignan, France, six days before his 90th birthday. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2022 deaths Category:French comics artists Category:French cartoonists Category:People from Gironde
title: Jean-Jacques Sempé
